mapper.select:
SELECT r.* FROM t_dorm_room r INNER JOIN t_dorm_building b ON r.building_id = b.building_id WHERE r.room_status = 1 AND r.occupied_beds < r.total_beds
AND r.building_id = #{buildingId}
AND (b.gender_limit = 0 OR b.gender_limit = #{genderLimit})
ORDER BY r.room_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dorm_room (building_id, room_number, full_name, total_beds, occupied_beds, room_status) VALUES (#{buildingId}, #{roomNumber}, #{fullName}, #{totalBeds}, #{occupiedBeds}, #{roomStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_dorm_room SET room_status = #{roomStatus} WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
UPDATE t_dorm_room SET occupied_beds = #{occupiedBeds} WHERE room_id = #{roomId}
